data.title: Top 10 most famous Dutch football players in the world
data.meta_description: Top of these Famous Dutch football player world's best ever. The names of total attack football have fascinated fans.
data.text:
Van Persie, Gullit, Van Dijk are all the most famous Dutch football players in the world. Let’s explore the prominent names of football in the land of tulips.

Dutch football brings many famous stars to the world soccer industry. The orange tornado has players who have created their own mark and brand. Nhà cái uy tín We will join you to learn about the most famous Dutch players in the soccer industry over the years.

Number1. famous Dutch football player – Robin van Persie

Van Persie is the most known Dutch player of the past 20 years

It would be surprising if we ranked this striker ahead of all the legends of Dutch football. But really, for football fans in the 21st century, Van Persie is the most prominent player of the national team of the land of tulips. Competing since 2003 and participating in the World Cups 2006, 2010, 2014, EURO 2008 and 2012. Van Persie has become the player who scores the most goals for the Dutch national team with 50 goals.

Number2. Dutch legend of the 20th century – Johan Cruyff

Johan Cruyff is a 20th century Dutch football legend and of world football. His philosophy of total attack football was widely applied to later coaches. Therefore, the name of this legend is known to more and more fans. Previously when competing, he was also successful with 8 Dutch domestic championships, 5 KNVB Cups and 3 European Cups. Pele also chose him as a legend in the team of the 20th century.

Number3. Famous Dutch player – Ronald Koeman

Koeman was the best Dutch Player in 1987 and 1988

Koeman was the best Dutch player in 1987 and 1988 and is also considered a legend of Tulip football. Four-time Dutch domestic champion, three KNVB Cups and one European Cup. At Barcelona, ​​Koeman also had 264 goals despite playing as a defensive midfielder.

Number4. Striker Marco van Basten

Marco van Basten has been compared to Maradona, Pele, Alfredo Di Stefano or other world football legends. Even though this famous Dutch football player retired at the age of 28, he quickly won three golden balls. Van Basten can be said to be the most iconic figure and striker produced by Dutch football.

Number5. Outstanding Dutch player Frank Rijkaard

Frank Rijkaard was part of the trio that brought the Netherlands to the Euro championship in 1988. His achievements at Ajax were also very respectable, such as 5 national championships, three national cups and a Champions League. Playing successfully at AC Milan with his two close friends, it can be said that this is a legendary midfielder in world football.

Number6. Famous Dutch goalkeeper – Van der Sar

The only goalkeeper on the list – Van der Sar

Having 50 clean sheets is a record in the European Cup and 130 matches for the Dutch national team, making him the goalkeeper with the most caps for the Dutch national team. The awards he has with MU are proof of this goalkeeper’s success.

Edwin van der Sar will therefore be indispensable in the list Famous Dutch football player and most known. The success of this legendary goalkeeper will forever be mentioned at MU and in the Netherlands.

Number 7. Outstanding Dutch player C.Seedorf

Only after having Clarence Seedorf did Dutch football perfect the concept of an all-round midfielder. Previously they only had players with a specialized position. Fabio Capello and Van Gaal are the coaches who helped Seedorf become famous at Sampdoria, Real and Inter.

Number8. Famous Dutch striker Dennis Bergkamp

The most successful Dutchman in England before Van Persie appeared was definitely striker Dennis Bergkamp. Arsenal’s symbol, when you come to Emirate Stadium at this time, there will still be a statue of Dennis Bergkamp outside the stadium. Bergkamp’s contributions to Arsenal are therefore undisputed and neither is this striker’s popularity.

Number 9. Famous Dutch football players – R. Gullit

The trio of geniuses Van Basten, Gullit and Rijkaard who won the Euro 1988 have become legendary. A special place in Dutch history as the five captains of the Orange Cyclone who won that year. The midfielder’s brilliant performance and talented playing style have delighted many fans.

10. Famous Dutch player Virgil van Dijk today

Young and talented midfielder – Van Dijk

If you don’t admit that this is the number 1 midfielder in the world in the past few years, then that is a mistake. Although he has only played for the Dutch national team 33 times, this 28-year-old midfielder will definitely be a legend of football in the land of tulips.

Conclude
